article_title: Can I Change My Health Insurance Plan Outside of Open Enrollment?

article_metadata.description: There are few circumstances that qualify you to change your health insurance plan mid-year. Barring these “qualifying events,” you must wait until open enrollment to make policy changes.
article_metadata.author: Christina LaMontagne
